annotation.spannedText: It is essential that children complete the vaccination cycle as scheduled

classMention.mentionClass: It is essential that children complete the vaccination cycle as scheduled

annotation.spannedText: If your child has not been vaccinated as scheduled, you need to seek medical advice to ensure that your child receives adequate protection

classMention.mentionClass: If your child has not been vaccinated as scheduled, you need to seek medical advice to ensure that your child receives adequate protection

annotation.spannedText: The high vaccination rate means that these serious diseases have now become a rarity

classMention.mentionClass: The high vaccination rate means that these serious diseases have now become a rarity

annotation.spannedText: We need to keep it that way by ensuring that children are vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: We need to keep it that way by ensuring that children are vaccinated
